mapper.update: UPDATE SL_EP_CAP SET FTY_ASSET=#{ftyAsset}, FTY_LAND_AREA=#{ftyLandArea}, FTY_FLOOR_AREA=#{ftyFloorArea}, FTY_EQUIPMENT=#{ftyEquipment}, FTY_DESIGN_CAP=#{ftyDesignCap}, FTY_ACTUAL_CAP=#{ftyActualCap}, FTY_FT_RATE=#{ftyFtRate}, FTY_DS_RATE=#{ftyDsRate}, FTY_AS_RATE=#{ftyAsRate}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE EP_ID=#{epId}
